description: Numerators of continued fraction convergents to sqrt(15).
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..200
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (0,8,0,-1).
formula: G.f.: (3+4*x+3*x^2-x^3)/(1-8*x^2+x^4).From _Gerry Martens_, Jul 11 2015: (Start)Interspersion of 2 sequences [a0(n),a1(n)] for n>0:a0(n) = (-((4-sqrt(15))^n*(3+sqrt(15)))+(-3+sqrt(15))*(4+sqrt(15))^n)/2.a1(n) = ((4-sqrt(15))^n+(4+sqrt(15))^n)/2. (End)
